title: How to Play Dirge of Cereberus FFVII

steps.headline: Dirge of Cerberus is for the PS2 console so, if you don't have one, GET OUT OF HERE!!
1 Controls.
jumping is used by pressing the X button press it again to perform a double jump.
steps.description: Don't try jumping down the stairs because the game wasn't programmed to do that. Personally, that sucks.

steps.headline: Vincent is a talented marksman but, when things get close, Vincent can lower his gun and smack a tooth out.
steps.description: press the O button to lower your gun and press the O button when the gun is lowered to melee.

steps.headline: Press the triangle button to open up the main menu where you can check the map, customize your gun and safely consume items.
Throughout the game, there are scattered pools of Mako that increases your mako which is used to execute strong materia blasts.
steps.description: step over one to increase mako then press the L1 button to fire the materia. Remember, you must equip the selected materia element as an accessory to your gun before you can use it.

steps.headline: Press the R1 button to fire your gun
Use the left analog stick to move and the right analog stick to move the camera.
Press the square button to crouch and press the square button while moving to dash forward.
steps.description: When hit hard, Vincent gets sent flying into the air, then hits the ground immobilized for a few seconds. In battle a few seconds on the floor = death. To counter this, before you hit the ground, press the square button to land on the ground safely.

steps.headline: 2 Gun customization
Vincent used his handgun, Cerberus throughout Final Fantasy VII but for this mission, he uses 3 firearms.
Barrel
Frame
Scope
Optional
Accessory
With all these parts, you customize your gun.
steps.description: there are 3 barrels: Normal, long and short. The normal barrel is mostly used for the handgun, The long barrel is used for the rifle, and the short barrel for the machine gun.

steps.headline: The frames are Cerberus(handgun), Griffin(machine gun), and Hydra(rifle).
The scopes are the sniper scope and the materia floater.
Optional parts are small boosters for your gun.
steps.description: Ex. Materia booster adds power to materia blasts.

steps.headline: Accessories are used to enhance Vincent or add materia to the gun.
steps.description: Ex. Cerberus relief increases Vincent's defense.

steps.headline: These are the basic skills you need to play Dirge of Cerberus.
